pageContext.description: Width: max. d. 61.5mm; max. width 13.4mm; width terminals 6.7 & 7.7 mms; max th. 6.5mm,Pennanular bracelet, tapering towards both ends; v. slight expansion towards terminals poss. damage; slight convex inner face, fairly crisp side angles, strong convex outer face with tendency to central rounded ridge.
pageContext.surface: Mainly reddy brown dry surface; odd small patches of original patina - dark green; both terminals broken off in antiquity, possibly resulting in slight lips to ends of arms.; both arm ends little twisted, and ring little distorted from circle. Worn a little smooth for part of inside - recent probably.
pageContext.collection: McBride, L.F.M. (Mr.) - Private,7 Langmore Close, Eggbuckland, Plyouth, Devon
pageContext.site: England,Devonshire,Plymouth,Eggbuckland,7 Langmore Close,Found in topsoil of back garden; no topsoil had apparently been imported to the site, having simply been removed therefore and replaced.
pageContext.toSearch: 7 Langmore Close, Plymouth, Plymouth Pl6 5pp, UK
